faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about overnight investing.

q1.question: How does overnight investing work?
q1.answer: Every night, your idle cash is automatically invested in overnight money market funds. These are ultra-safe, liquid investments that earn interest overnight and are returned to your account each morning.

q2.question: Is my money safe?
q2.answer: Absolutely. Your funds are FDIC insured up to $250,000 and protected with bank-grade encryption. We partner with regulated financial institutions and never have direct access to your money.

q3.question: Can I withdraw my money anytime?
q3.answer: Yes! Your funds are available 24/7. You can withdraw any amount at any time without penalties or fees. Funds typically arrive in your bank account within 1-2 business days.

q4.question: What's the minimum balance required?
q4.answer: There's no minimum balance for our Starter plan. You can start with as little as $1 and still earn overnight interest. Higher tiers offer better rates and features for larger balances.

q5.question: How are taxes handled?
q5.answer: We provide detailed tax reports and integrate with popular tax software. Plus and Premium members get access to tax optimization tools that help minimize your tax burden legally.

q6.question: What makes this different from a savings account?
q6.answer: Traditional savings accounts offer minimal interest (often under 0.5% APY). We leverage overnight money market funds to provide significantly higher returns (up to 4.5% APY) while maintaining the same safety and accessibility.
